raw_comment:
What do you notice? 

I notice that the young girls are higher up on the scale in reaching out to their parents, then the young men are. 


What do you wonder? 

I wonder what the number calculations would be. 


How does this relate to you and your community? 


This relate to me because as a young woman I always check up on my mom and she does the same. People in my community are very close with their families, I feel like they stay in communication with the one another. 
 
Headline 
 
Who’s mom’s favorite?
ace_sentences: I notice that young girls are higher on the scale of reaching out to their parents than young men are.
I wonder what the number calculations would be.
I always check up on my mother.
My mother also checks up on me.
People in my community are very close with their families.
People in my community stay in communication with one another.
The headline is: Who is mom's favorite?
